description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Support.Item.5HnWXmOp8qNjfhdU]{Wolf Support Benefit}

Your Strikes that damage creatures your wolf threatens give the target a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds (–10 on a critical success).

rules.text: Your Strikes that damage creatures your wolf threatens give the target a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.UhWenwf5XOlk9ZHY]{Effect: Wolf Support Benefit (-5-foot penalty)}
rules.title: {item|name}

rules.text: Your Strikes that damage creatures your wolf threatens give the target a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.6x4zqyWl3pQiE9lw]{Effect: Wolf Support Benefit (-10-foot penalty)}
